title: Inductor - energy stored in oscillating inductor

content.prompt: The current in an inductor oscillates sinusoidally as a function of time. Which of the following is true about the energy stored in the magnetic field generated by the current in the inductor?

choices.label: The energy stored is never zero.
The energy stored is zero at the same time the current in the inductor is zero.
The energy stored is zero only at the moment the circuit is connected.
The energy stored is zero at the same time the induced emf is zero.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
